definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="espera">espera</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="255" y="159"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">give @a confinalandroleplay:chalecoreflectantebody</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_remove_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:ThePurge</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @a {"text":"NORMAS DE LA PURGA:","color":"red","bold":true}</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @a {"text":"· Tienes 4 minutos para equiparte y salir a luchar por tu vida","color":"white"}</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @a {"text":"· Cierra Discord sólo se permite el chat de voz por proximidad","color":"white"}</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @a {"text":"· La zona de juego se irá reduciendo poco a poco","color":"white"}</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @a {"text":"· Todo vale, estás en un Battle Royale","color":"white"}</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @a {"text":"· Cuando mueras, tendrán que levantarte. No perderás niveles","color":"white"}</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @a {"text":"· Prohibido matar a alguien que esté levantando","color":"white"}</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @a {"text":"· Si te eliminan, ponte el chaleco y ayuda a revivir a los caídos","color":"white"}</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @a {"text":"· Se entregará una copa a los 3 finalistas","color":"white"}</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @a {"text":"· Que empiece la purga","color":"white"}</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">worldborder set 1700</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">worldborder set 50 750</field></block></value><next><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">CUSTOM:the_purge</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5000</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
